SS swoops down to catch his boa and flies away cursing the other 
dragon and swearing his revenge.

OOC: You too.  But may be I missunderstood, but it seemed Epyon let 
go of the whip so it would still be embedded in SS?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> Epyon brings his shield up, blocking the boa. He also has the whip 
wrap
> around the boa. Then, bringing his arm down, Epyon tossed the boa 
to the
> ground, as the whip returns to its place, within the shield.
> 
> Epyon looks to the others.
> "I think he is retreating."
> 
> OOC: Good fight, Dewboy. I really had to think in that one.
